src:
Kelti srušili Rim u 94. minutu, uzaludan gol Kostića
07 Nov 2019, 21:16 by Zile
Odigrana je prva polovina utakmica 4. kola Lige Evrope.
Sevilja nije imala nikakvih problema u Luksemburgu, a već u prvih 45 minuta Andalužani su dali četiri gola. APOEL je uspeo da preokrene u nastavku protiv Karabaga i ostane u trci za plasman u nokaut fazu. Kod izjednačujućeg gola Kiprana korner je izveo naš Uroš Matić.
Dva remija viđena su u B grupi, pa je u njoj ostao status kvo. Kopenhagen i Dinamo iz Kijeva su igrali 1:1 na Parkenu, dok u Luganu nije bilo golova. Kijevljani su u Danskoj promašili i penal kod vođstva domaćina u prvom poluvremenu. Ipak, Verbić je poravnao u nastavku.
I drugi put je Bazel bio uspešniji od Hetafea, ovaj put na Sent Jakobu. Gosti su poveli, ali nisu osvojili ni bod. To je iskoristio Krasnodar, pobedivši Trabzon i drugi put u 15 dana i sada se na tabeli izjednačio sa Špancima.
LASK je demolirao PSV u drugom poluvremenu u Lincu. Holanđani su poveli iz penala na startu utakmice, ali su Austrijanci u drugom poluvremenu postigli četiri gola i ubedljivo pobedili. Dvostruki strelac bio je Klaus. Očekivan trijumf ostvario je Sporting u Trondhajmu protiv Rozenborga koji je digao ruke od ovog takmičenja.
Uzbudljivo je bilo na rimskom Olimpiku, Lacio je poveo golom Imobilea, ali je Seltik do poluvremena poravnao preko Foresta. Napadali su domaći želeći da dođu do pobedekoja bi ih ostavila u trci za plasman u narednu fazu, ali su primili gol u 94. minutu, strelac je bio Enčam, pa su Kelti dva puta za dve sedmice preokrenuli protiv Rimljana. Kluž je golom u samom finišu meča došao do pobede protiv Rena. Strelac je posle kornera bio Rondon, koji je glavom zakucao loptu u mrežu. Isti fudbaler je isključen u 90. minutu.
Na kraju, u grupi F igrana je samo jedna utakmica, pošto su Gimaraeš i Arsenal igrali u utorak. U Liježu je Standard pobedio Ajntraht 2:1. Sve do 94. minuta bilo je1:1, gol za goste postigao je Filip Kostić, koji je precizno izveo slobodan udarac, ali je Lestijen doneo trijumf Standardu.
Grupa A:
APOEL – Karabag 2:1(0:1)Dudelanž – Sevilja 2:5(0:4)
Grupa B:
FC Kopenhagen – Dinamo Kijev 1:1(1:0)Lugano – Malme 0:0
Grupa C:
Bazel – Hetafe 2:1(1:1)Krasnodar – Trabzon 3:1(2:0)
Grupa D:
Rozenborg – Sporting 0:2(0:2)LASK – PSV 4:1(0:1)
Grupa E:
Lacio – Seltik 1:2(1:1)Kluž – Ren 1:0(0:0)
Grupa F:
Standard – Ajntraht 2:1(0:0)Gimaraeš – Arsenal 1:1(0:0)

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
The Celts brought down Rome in the 94th minute, Kostic's futile goal
07 Nov 2019, 21:16 by Zile
The first half of the Europa League Round 4 games was played.
Seville had no problems in Luxembourg, and in the first 45 minutes the Andalusians scored four goals. APOEL was able to reverse the sequel against Karabagh and remain in the knockout stage race. Uroš Matic's corner kick was scored by Kipran.
Two draws were seen in Group B, so the status quo remained there. Copenhagen and Dynamo Kyiv played 1-1 at Parken, while there were no goals in Lugano. Kiev also missed a penalty in the home side in the first half. Still, Verbic aligned below.
And for the second time, Basel was more successful than Getafe, this time at St. Jacob. The guests took the lead but did not score. This was used by Krasnodar, beating Trabzon for the second time in 15 days and now he is on the table with the Spaniards.
LASK demolished PSV in Linz in the second half. The Dutch took the penalty kick at the start of the game, but the Austrians scored four goals in the second half and won convincingly. The double scorer was Klaus. The expected triumph came from Sporting in Trondheim against Rosenborg, who raised his hands from this competition.
It was exciting at the Roman Olympics, Lazio led off with a goal by Imobile, but Celtic leveled halfway through Forest. They attacked the home side, wanting to win, which would leave them in the race for the next stage, but they received a goal in the 94th minute, the scorer was Encham, so the Celts turned against the Romans twice in two weeks. Cluj scored a goal in the very end of the match against Reno. The scorer was Rondon, who headed the ball into the net. The same football player was turned off in the 90th minute.
In the end, there was only one match in Group F, as Guimaraes and Arsenal played on Tuesday. In Liege, Standard beat Eintracht 2: 1. Until the 94th minute it was 1: 1, the visitors' goal was scored by Filip Kostic, who delivered a free kick, but Lestien brought a triumph to Standard.
Group A:
APOEL - Carabagh 2: 1 (0: 1) Dudelange - Seville 2: 5 (0: 4)
Group B:
FC Copenhagen - Dynamo Kyiv 1: 1 (1: 0) Lugano - Malmo 0: 0
Group C:
Basel - Getafe 2: 1 (1: 1) Krasnodar - Trabzon 3: 1 (2: 0)
Group D:
Rosenborg - Sporting 0: 2 (0: 2) LASK - PSV 4: 1 (0: 1)
Group E:
Lazio - Celtic 1: 2 (1: 1) Cluj - Rennes 1: 0 (0: 0)
Group F:
Standard - Eintracht 2: 1 (0: 0) Guimaraes - Arsenal 1: 1 (0: 0)
